articles.title: Sky Sports killed off its female-focused Halo brand after just three days
articles.description: That Sky Sports felt the need to launch a TikTok channel specifically marketed towards women and billed as its “lil sis” was questionable enough. But once people got a taste of the content on Halo, it was clear the company had absolutely no idea what it was doing. Halo didn’t focus on women's sports, nor […]
articles.author: Terrence O’Brien
